effect_entries.effect: Halves the target's Defense for damage calculation, which is similar to doubling the attack's power.
User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Inflicts severe damage but
makes the user faint.

Inflicts severe damage but
makes the user faint.

Very powerful but
makes user faint.

Very powerful but
makes user faint.

The user explodes
to inflict terrible
damage even while
fainting itself.

The user explodes to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.

The user explodes to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.

The user explodes to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.

Le lanceur explose et inflige des
dégâts à tous les Pokémon autour
de lui. Met K.O. le lanceur.

The user explodes to inflict damage on
those around it.
The user faints upon using this move.

The user explodes to inflict damage on
those around it.
The user faints upon using this move.

おおきな　ばくはつで　じぶんの
まわりに　いるものを　こうげきする。
つかった　あとに　ひんしに　なる。

큰 폭발로 자신의
주위에 있는 포켓몬을 공격한다.
쓰고 나서는 기절한다.

Le lanceur explose et inflige des dégâts à tous
les Pokémon autour de lui. Met K.O. le lanceur.

Anwender explodiert, richtet bei allen Pokémon
in seiner Umgebung großen Schaden an und
wird besiegt.

El atacante causa una grandísima explosión y hiere
a todos a su alrededor. El usuario se debilita de
inmediato.

Chi la usa esplode per infliggere danni
agli altri Pokémon attorno, ma va KO.

The user attacks everything around it
by causing a tremendous explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.

大きな　爆発で　自分の
周りに　いるものを　攻撃する。
使ったあとに　ひんしに　なる。

おおきな　ばくはつで　じぶんの
まわりに　いるものを　こうげきする。
つかった　あとに　ひんしに　なる。

in seiner Umgebung großen Schaden an und
wird besiegt.

El atacante causa una grandísima explosión y hiere 
a todos a su alrededor. El usuario se debilita de 
inmediato.

Chi la usa esplode per infliggere danni
agli altri Pokémon attorno, ma va KO.

by causing a tremendous explosion.
The user faints upon using this move.

周りに　いるものを　攻撃する。

큰 폭발로 자신의
주위에 있는 포켓몬을 공격한다.
쓰고 나서는 기절한다.

引起大爆炸，
攻擊自己周圍所有的寶可夢。
使用後自己會陷入瀕死。

Le lanceur explose et inflige des dégâts à tous
les Pokémon autour de lui. Met K.O. le lanceur.

Anwender explodiert, richtet bei allen Pokémon in
seiner Umgebung großen Schaden an und wird selbst
kampfunfähig.

El atacante causa una grandísima explosión y hiere 
a todos a su alrededor. El usuario se debilita de 
inmediato.

Chi la usa esplode per infliggere danni
agli altri Pokémon attorno, ma va KO.

The user attacks everything around it by causing a
tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using
this move.

周りに　いるものを　攻撃する。
